† Proportion has a relative standard error between 25% and 50% and should be used with caution.
‡ Proportion has a relative standard error greater than 50% and is considered too unreliable for general use.
(a) Due to changes from 2012–13 and 2018–19, data items are not directly comparable across cycles.
(b) Excludes 'not applicable'. Applicable population is those aged 15 and over and present at the interview.
(c) Includes avoided doctors, nurses or other staff at hospitals or doctor's surgeries.

Note: Percentages calculated within columns. Cells in this table have been randomly adjusted to avoid the release of confidential data. Discrepancies may occur between sums of the component items and totals.
Source: AIHW and ABS analysis of National Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Health Survey 2018–19.
